original_title: UFC Fight Night 222: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes
overview: UFC Fight Night 222: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on April 22, 2023, at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada. A heavyweight bout between Sergei Pavlovich and Curtis Blaydes headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 222: Pavlovich vs. Blaydes
